name: Mirror of the World
description:
Protect the world from deadly spheres! However, they are only vulnerable in the mirror dimension just below ours. Survive an increasing number of enemies in this endless survival. 

How to Play:

WASD to Move Around

E to Interact with Puddles and enter the “Mirror of the World”

Left Click to shoot while in the mirror world.

Left Shift to Sprint

Enemy spawns are random but ramp up the longer you survive. Good Luck!

Credits:
